alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 11:42AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County through 1215 PM MST... At 1141 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Valle, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
